name: From the Blender: Purple Superfoods Smoothie
description: I'm the first to admit skepticism about the term "superfoods"—I think all whole foods (and pizza slices and cheeseburgers) are pretty super when you come right down to it. But I still can't resist a healthy and delicious smoothie packed with some of the most-touted superfoods, including blueberries, almonds, and raw cacao.
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon raw cacao nibs or powder

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a blender and puree until perfectly smooth. Divide between two glasses and serve immediately.
